title: MLB announces umpires for ALCS
text:
MLB announces umpires for ALCS Kansas City takes on Toronto Friday at Kauffman Stadium Published 11:36 AM CDT Oct 16, 2015 A Large Text Photos 
Major League Baseball announced the umpires for the American League Championship Series, which starts Friday in Kansas City. Related Royals fans gather on Plaza for '... 
John Hirschbeck will lead the ALCS crew, marking his 19 th career Postseason assignment, including his fifth LCS. 
His crew will consist of Laz Diaz, Dan Iassogna, regular season crew chief Jeff Nelson, Tony Randazzo and Hunter Wendelstedt. 
Randazzo will be the home plate umpire in Game One. Major League Umpire Jim Reynolds will serve as the ALCS Replay Official in Games One and Two, with the assistance of fellow Umpire Mike Estabrook, before Randazzo shifts into that role beginning in Game Three. 
The Kansas City Royals and the Toronto Blue Jays will play the ALCS opener Friday night at Kauffman Stadium.
